name: wishbone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the V-shaped bone between the neck and breast of a cooked bird that traditionally is removed from the bird and pulled apart by two people, allowing the one who gets the longer piece to make a secret wish
ranasu/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
